translation.en: ♪ I'm no slobby boy ♪ ♪ I never beg for no money ♪ ♪ Fun, fun, funny You'll run from me ♪
Target approaching.
Stone, how we doing?
[woman] Almost there. Just pulling the encryption key.
translation.it: Ci siamo quasi. Acquisisco la chiave di cifratura.

translation.en: Four hours in the van, and she's eaten all the crisps.
translation.it: Quattro ore nel furgone e ha mangiato tutte le patatine.

translation.en: She's stuck in there with you, so that's comfort eating.
translation.it: È bloccata lì con te. Si sfoga col cibo.

translation.en: Been boring her with your cat chat again?
translation.it: - Tu e le tue chiacchiere sui gatti. - Chiacchiere?

translation.en: Cat chat? Actually, Parker, she likes my Barry the Cat stories.
translation.it: - Tu e le tue chiacchiere sui gatti. - Chiacchiere? Le piacciono le mie storie su Barry il Gatto.

translation.en: You like my Barry the Cat stories, right?
Before you know it, you're gonna want one of your own.
translation.it: Senza accorgertene, ne vorrai uno anche tu.

translation.en: [inhales sharply] Cats hate me. Sorry, Bailey.
translation.it: I gatti mi odiano. Scusa, Bailey.

translation.en: Writing a new access code.
I have eyes on Mulvaney. Intel was good.
translation.it: Vedo Mulvaney. Le informazioni erano giuste.

translation.en: [Bailey] I can't believe it.
translation.it: Incredibile. Il trafficante d'armi più ricercato d'Europa

translation.en: Europe's most wanted arms dealer seen for the first time in three years.
translation.it: Incredibile. Il trafficante d'armi più ricercato d'Europa avvistato per la prima volta in tre anni.

translation.en: Adding names and faces to the guest list.
translation.it: Aggiungo nomi e volti alla lista degli invitati.

translation.en: -How long do you need? -[Stone] Nearly there.
translation.it: - Quanto tempo ti serve? - Ci sono quasi.

translation.en: Hang on. Something's changed. I can't connect.
translation.it: Aspetta. È cambiato qualcosa. Non riesco a connettermi.

translation.en: The system's offline.
Local access only.
We need a new plan to get you in.
translation.it: Ci serve un nuovo piano per farti entrare.

translation.en: What do you mean?
I need direct access to someone who's already on the network.
translation.it: Mi serve l'accesso a qualcuno che è già in rete.

translation.en: Head of security. He's at the bar.
translation.it: Il capo della sicurezza. È al bar.

translation.en: [Stone] I could hack his phone, but I'll need to be close to him.
translation.it: Potrei hackerargli il telefono, ma devo stargli vicino.

translation.en: -How close? -Ten feet.
[Parker] Stone, you're not a field agent. Do not get out of the van.
translation.it: Stone, non sei un agente operativo. Non scendere dal furgone.

translation.en: She can do this.
[woman] It's too dangerous.
Mulvaney's entering now.
Our arms dealer's on the move right now, and I do not wanna lose him.
translation.it: Il nostro trafficante è in movimento e non voglio perderlo.

translation.en: [Bailey] There's no other way. We have to get Mulvaney.
translation.it: È l'unico modo. Dobbiamo prendere Mulvaney.

translation.en: Tell me what you need.
When I'm within ten feet of the head of security, call his phone.
translation.it: Quando sarò a tre metri, chiamalo al telefono.

translation.en: Okay, got it.
Hey. Hey, Stone.
You got this.
Thanks, Bailey.
[Parker] I can't tail them any further.
[woman] Stone, listen to me. Waiter to your right.
translation.it: Stone, ascoltami. Cameriere alla tua destra. Prendi lo champagne.

translation.en: Grab a glass of champagne.
translation.it: Cameriere alla tua destra. Prendi lo champagne.

translation.en: -Thank you. -[woman] Good. Now, drink it.
Liquid courage.
[Parker] He's headed towards the blackjack table.
translation.it: Va verso il tavolo del blackjack.

translation.en: Do you know how to play?
I was on the chess team.
Oh my God.
-[Parker] Just place a bet. -Welcome.
[Parker] Doesn't matter if you lose.
[dealer] Change set, seven. One hundred.
-[phone ringing] -One hundred, change seven.
[Stone] Okay, I have access.
[dealer] One hundred, sir, in change. Okay. Everybody ready?
translation.it: Cento di resto, signore. Bene. Tutti pronti?

translation.en: He's looking suspicious.
[dealer] Place your bets.
He's headed towards you.
Stone, walk away.
-Walk away. Walk away-- -[music ends]
What are you doing?
I've never played before.
-[dealer] Sixteen. -I'm sorry.
[man] You split your eights.
Splitting your eights. Eighteen.
Eighteen.
Dealer has 17.
-Ah, you win. -You win it.
Maybe I should quit while I'm ahead.
-[chuckles] -Thank you.
[woman] Nice job, Stone.
Not bad for your first time out of the van. I think I just lost two years off my life.
translation.it: - Non male la tua prima sortita. - Ho perso due anni di vita.

translation.en: -Did it work? -[Stone] Yeah, I'm in.
[Parker] Where the hell's Mulvaney?
Okay. Got him. Through the kitchen, down the stairs.
translation.it: Ok. Ce l'ho. In cucina, giù per le scale.

translation.en: Two heavies working the door.
On our way.
Inserting you into facial recognition.
Hello, beautiful.
May I take this seat?
Take it anywhere you like.
[chuckles] Okay.
Maybe later?
[Stone] Okay, you're all set.
I'm almost afraid to see what drew Mulvaney out of his hole.
translation.it: Non voglio pensare a cosa l'ha fatto uscire dalla tana.

translation.en: -Lads. -[guard 1] Buona sera.
Okay.
[announcer] We're now taking bets for the next game,
translation.it: Si accettano scommesse per la prossima partita.

translation.en: which will begin in two minutes. [woman] You were right about Mulvaney's gambling habit.
translation.it: - Inizierà tra due minuti. - Avevi ragione sul suo vizio del gioco.

translation.en: He never met a bet he didn't place.
[announcer] You must predict the exact order of kills.
translation.it: Dovrete prevedere l'ordine esatto delle morti.

translation.en: [soldier] Copy, Delta Kilo Six. We have reported hostiles…
translation.it: Ricevuto, Delta Kilo Six. Si riportano ostilità…

translation.en: Those are military operations.
They're wagering on body count. [announcer] With a bet of four instant kills,
translation.it: - Scommettono sul numero dei morti. - Con quattro uccisioni,

translation.en: this is a win for player number 46.
translation.it: la vittoria va al giocatore numero 46.

translation.en: Betting on blood.
[Bailey] Yang, show me.
Just a bit to your right.
Holy shit.
That's US Navy Seals in real-time.
translation.it: Quelli sono i Navy SEAL in tempo reale.

translation.en: And they've cracked military-grade encryption.
translation.it: E hanno violato un sistema di cifratura militare.

translation.en: Who would have that capability?
Enough tech talk. Target is Mulvaney.
translation.it: Basta chiacchiere tech. Il target è Mulvaney.

translation.en: Okay, Dr. Yang. You have the floor.
translation.it: Ok, dott.ssa Yang. Tocca a te.

translation.en: Time to give Mulvaney his heart attack.
I'll fire up the ambulance.
Mulvaney's exiting.
Shit.
[Yang] I'll handle this guy. You take Mulvaney.
translation.it: Ci penso io a lui. Tu prendi Mulvaney.

translation.en: Stone.
Mulvaney's on your right. Another service corridor.
translation.it: Mulvaney è a destra. Un altro corridoio di servizio.

translation.en: Stand by to go dark.
[man] Shit.
I've got Mulvaney. Bailey, get us out of here. Fast.
translation.it: Ho Mulvaney. Bailey, portaci via da qui. Veloce.

translation.en: Showtime!
All right. Okay. All right.
[woman] MI6, right?
You guys really need to work on your subtlety.
You ruined my party.
I should've listened to the voices in my head.
translation.it: Dovevo ascoltare le voci nella mia testa.

translation.en: "The British are coming. The British are coming."
Comms compromised.
-No shit. -Okay, okay. New plan.
translation.it: - Non mi dire. - Ok. Nuovo piano.

translation.en: Exfil route Bravo. We have to go dark. Copy that. See you down there.
translation.it: - Estrazione B. Chiudo comunicazioni. - Ricevuto. Ci vediamo giù.

translation.en: Come on.
Stone! Let's go.
Hey!
I'm not going anywhere.
We're not done yet.
[Yang] More of Mulvaney's men.
They're heading to the cable car station. Parker's a sitting duck.
translation.it: Si dirigono alla funivia. Parker è un bersaglio facile. Dobbiamo andare lì.

translation.en: We need to get down there now.
translation.it: Parker è un bersaglio facile. Dobbiamo andare lì.

translation.en: -Stone! -Go without me. I'll be fine.
translation.it: - Stone! - Andate senza di me. Me la caverò.

translation.en: Stay put. We'll be back.
Jack, this is Nine of Hearts. Urgent forecast required.
translation.it: Jack, qui è Nove di Cuori. Si richiedono previsioni urgenti.

translation.en: Nine, we have your position and the full overview.
translation.it: Abbiamo la tua posizione e una panoramica completa.

translation.en: Projecting forward now.
The MI6 team won't get down the mountain in time.
translation.it: Il team dell'MI6 non arriverà in tempo.

translation.en: The Heart gives a 93 percent chance that Parker will die
translation.it: Il Cuore prevede una probabilità del 93% che Parker muoia e Mulvaney scappi

translation.en: and Mulvaney will get away unless the Charter intervenes.
translation.it: Il Cuore prevede una probabilità del 93% che Parker muoia e Mulvaney scappi a meno che non intervenga il Charter.

translation.en: I'm gonna need a parachute.
Okay.
Fifty meters away, over the handrail to your right.
translation.it: A 50 m, oltre il corrimano alla tua destra.

translation.en: And don't blow your cover.
translation.it: E non far saltare la copertura.

translation.en: On it.
[man] Oi!
The Heart has a chance of success at just 32 percent.
translation.it: Le probabilità di successo sono al 32%.

translation.en: Not helping, Jack.
Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa.
Um… Stone, big drop coming up.
Big drop.
-How big? -[Jack] The mother of big.
Really, really big.
And we're in the game.
Look, I've got money.
More than you can imagine.
It wouldn't be enough.
Eight minutes out. We're not gonna make it.
translation.it: Otto minuti. Non ce la faremo.

translation.en: Stone, Mulvaney's security are arriving at the cable car station.
translation.it: Stone, la sicurezza di Mulvaney sta arrivando alla funivia.

translation.en: Take the route to your left. You need to pick up the pace.
translation.it: Prendi il percorso alla tua sinistra. Devi accelerare.

translation.en: The terrain's too flat, and you're losing altitude.
translation.it: La pendenza è esigua e perdi quota.

translation.en: If you cut across to the piste, you can pick up a snow bike.
translation.it: Taglia per la pista e prendi una motoslitta.

translation.en: Cables! Cables! Cables! Ca--
Chance of success just plummeted.
translation.it: Le probabilità di successo sono crollate.

translation.en: Only 'cause you've got no imagination.
Oh, nice. Nice.
[Bailey] Oh, you're joking!
Come on!
He can hold them off without us, right?
translation.it: Può farcela senza di noi, no?

translation.en: Hold on!
[Jack] You can get ahead of the bikes at the next corner.
translation.it: Alla prossima curva gli sei davanti.

translation.en: [man] Hey. Are you okay?
We meet again.
Must be destiny.
Must be.
[man] Hey.
Hey! Hey!
Stone, watch Bailey and Yang to your right.
translation.it: Occhio a Bailey e Yang sulla destra.

translation.en: The Charter's worked too hard to embed you in MI6.
translation.it: Il Charter ha lavorato sodo per infiltrarti nell'MI6.

translation.en: We cannot risk your cover.
Well aware, Jack.
How many in the welcome party?
[Jack] Six of them.
Four pistols, one shotgun, and a sniper
translation.it: Quattro pistole, un fucile e un cecchino

translation.en: with a very impressive record.
Get out of the way!
[Jack] Get away from them. Take the path to your right.
The sniper has opened fire on Parker.
translation.it: Il cecchino ha aperto il fuoco su Parker.

translation.en: [Stone] Jack, give me a line.
I got the lights.
[Jack] Behind you!
Chance of success to 85%.
Only 85%?
Hardly seems fair.
Uh… two more on your right.
[Stone] Look at that.
Parker and target still very much alive.
translation.it: Parker e il target sono ancora vivi.

translation.en: [exhales] Great.
Now, hide the bodies and get out before MI6 sees you.
translation.it: Ora nascondi i corpi e vattene prima che ti vedano.

translation.en: Okay.
What's happening?
-Yang. -Hey.
Where'd they go?
Where'd who go?
Mulvaney had an army of security.
[Parker] Got scared off by the sirens maybe?
No point waiting to find out. Let's just grab him and go.
translation.it: Non perdiamo tempo. Prendiamolo e via.

translation.en: -Whoa, whoa, whoa! He's foaming. -Shit.
[Bailey] Bastard took cyanide.
[Yang] That's old school.
Shit.
Jesus. He's dead.
Grab a leg. We have to get back up the mountain for Stone.
translation.it: Prendigli una gamba. Dobbiamo risalire a recuperare Stone.

translation.en: All right, genius. Now what?
♪ Believe me, all I want is you ♪
Genuine dog's breakfast.
The Italians are livid, as are Defense and Number 10.
translation.it: Gli italiani sono furibondi, così come la Difesa e Downing Street.

translation.en: -I take full responsibility. -[man] "I." That's your problem, Parker.
translation.it: - Mi assumo io la responsabilità. - È questo il tuo problema.

translation.en: Mulvaney's dead.
Yang gave the wrong person a heart attack.
translation.it: Yang ha provocato un infarto alla persona sbagliata e Stone…

translation.en: And Stone, what the hell were you thinking getting out of the van?
translation.it: Yang ha provocato un infarto alla persona sbagliata e Stone… Perché diavolo sei scesa?

translation.en: -That was the only way she could get-- -[man] Put it in the report.
translation.it: - Era l'unico modo… - Mettetelo nel rapporto.

translation.en: Paperwork. Excellent. That'll show Mulvaney's lads who's boss.
translation.it: Scartoffie. Ottimo. Così sì che capiranno chi comanda.

translation.en: [man] Enough.
Mulvaney's gone. And so is any hope of using him as an asset.
translation.it: Mulvaney è morto e non potremo usarlo come risorsa.

translation.en: But now we have a new target.
Someone broke through the highest levels of military encryption, including our own.
translation.it: Qualcuno ha violato i massimi livelli di cifratura militare, incluso il nostro.

translation.en: -Did you look into the girl? -[man] The girl?
Oh, yes. I'm afraid we'll need more than that.
translation.it: Ah, giusto. Temo che ci servirà qualcosa in più.

translation.en: We are trying to trace her, but so far, we have nothing.
-I'm happy to look-- -[man] We have people for that.
translation.it: - Potrei… - C'è chi se ne occupa.

translation.en: Different people.
You can all concentrate on your admin. Sandra.
[Parker] Cheers, Sandra.
Thanks, Sandra. Love you, Sandra.
translation.it: - Grazie, Sandra. - Ti voglio bene, Sandra.

translation.en: [Bailey] To Stone.
-First time out of the van. -[all] Hey!
translation.it: - Prima volta fuori dal furgone. - Ehi!

translation.en: -[Bailey] And she didn't blow the op-- -[Yang] No, we did that all on our own.
translation.it: - E non ha fatto saltare l'operazione… - Ci abbiamo pensato noi.

translation.en: Too bad. Been on a good winning streak since Stone joined us.
translation.it: Peccato. Avevamo avuto solo vittorie dall'arrivo di Stone.

translation.en: Thought you might be our lucky charm. But you did win at blackjack.
translation.it: Ti credevo il nostro portafortuna. Al blackjack hai vinto.

translation.en: And I'm never gambling again or stepping out of the van.
translation.it: E non giocherò mai più né uscirò mai più dal furgone.

translation.en: What'd you do when I left you up there?
[inhales] Hid in the toilets.
-What? You said to stay out of sight. -True.
translation.it: Che c'è? Non dovevano vedermi. - Vero. - Ok, lasciatela in pace.

translation.en: All right. Leave her alone.
We got more important things to discuss. Like, the girl.
translation.it: Abbiamo cose più importanti di cui parlare. Tipo, della ragazza.

translation.en: But let's be honest. We already know who she works for.
translation.it: Siamo onesti: sappiamo per chi lavora.

translation.en: -[sighs] God. -That's right. The Charter.
-Strap yourselves in. -[Yang laughs]
Whatever. I just identified another one of their ops.
translation.it: Spiritoso. Ho identificato un altro dei loro agenti.

translation.en: They took out a terror cell who hijacked an oil tanker in the Panama Canal.
translation.it: Hanno eliminato una cellula terroristica nel Canale di Panama.

translation.en: Yeah, but who would have that kind of power?
translation.it: Sì, ma chi avrebbe un potere del genere?

translation.en: -I'm doing it again, aren't I? -Yeah.
translation.it: - Lo sto facendo di nuovo. - Sì.

translation.en: Okay, fine, mock me. But it's true.
translation.it: Ok, prendetemi pure in giro, ma è tutto vero.

translation.en: Ex-intelligence operatives answering only to themselves.
translation.it: Ex agenti segreti che rispondono solo a loro stessi.

translation.en: No national allegiances, no political leanings.
Putting out fires their governments never allowed them to. That's…
translation.it: Intervengono dove i loro governi gli vietavano di andare.

translation.en: That's the Charter.
The most highly trained agents
translation.it: Gli agenti più preparati che collaborano per mantenere la pace

translation.en: working together to keep peace in a turbulent world.
translation.it: Gli agenti più preparati che collaborano per mantenere la pace in un mondo turbolento.

translation.en: No. That is a Saturday morning cartoon.
translation.it: No. È un cartone del sabato mattina.

translation.en: Nobody knows about the Charter because they don't exist.
translation.it: Nessuno li conosce perché non esistono.

translation.en: Pass me the vinegar.
-And this girl. -[laughs]
This girl is part of it, and you know it.
translation.it: Questa ragazza ne fa parte e voi lo sapete.

translation.en: Okay, don't judge me. I'm gonna go with this for a sec.
translation.it: Ok, lo asseconderò per un attimo.

translation.en: -If the Charter are such do-gooders… -Mm. …why'd the girl interrupt our mission?
translation.it: Se sono i buoni, perché la ragazza ha interrotto la missione?

translation.en: That's a good question. Yep.
Sorry, Bailey, there is no secret genius organization pulling all the strings.
translation.it: Mi spiace, Bailey, non esiste nessuna organizzazione segreta di geni.

translation.en: It's just us, Sandra, and her paperwork.
translation.it: Ci siamo solo noi, Sandra e le sue scartoffie.

translation.en: But it was a nice bedtime story. Speaking of which…
translation.it: È una bella storia della buonanotte, però. E infatti…

translation.en: Already?
-Jet lag. -Um, there's a one-hour time difference.
translation.it: Jet lag. C'è un'ora di differenza.

translation.en: Night, guys.
-Night. -Night.
[laughs] Right in the eye.
-I drive with that eye. -Might make you a better driver.
translation.it: - Nell'occhio! - Ci guido con quell'occhio! - Magari migliori. - Peggiorare è impossibile.

translation.en: [Yang] Can't make you worse.
-Kidding. I take it back. -[Parker] No.
Sneaking up on me? A field agent should be ready for anything.
translation.it: - Mi fai gli agguati? - Un agente dev'essere pronto a tutto.

translation.en: You were saying? I never should have told you I swim.
translation.it: Che dicevi? Non avrei mai dovuto dirti che nuotavo.

translation.en: A weak moment.
I liked it.
So… the girl.
What news?
No news. We were told not to look. You're a terrible liar.
translation.it: - Niente. Ci hanno detto di non guardare. - Sei una pessima bugiarda.

translation.en: Look, if we leave it to the pen-pushers at MI6,
translation.it: Se lasciamo che ci pensino gli scribacchini dell'MI6,

translation.en: she'll hack the entire world before we even get a name. I should've gone beyond the mission and brought her in.
translation.it: hackererà tutto prima di avere un nome. Avrei dovuto prenderla in custodia.

translation.en: Well, your hands were pretty full at the time.
And besides, it wasn't our objective.
translation.it: E poi, non era il nostro obiettivo.

translation.en: Why don't you try and live a little? Could be fun.
translation.it: Perché non provi a vivere un po'? Potresti divertirti.

translation.en: What happened to "Don't get out of the van, Rachel"? Ah.
translation.it: Cos'è successo a "Non scendere dal furgone, Rachel"?

translation.en: -This is different. -Hm.
So, rules are rules unless they apply to you.
translation.it: Quindi, le regole sono regole tranne che per te.

translation.en: Why do I feel like you know me better than I know you?
translation.it: Mi conosci meglio di quanto io conosca te.

translation.en: Maybe I should listen to one of these dreary podcasts of yours.
translation.it: Forse dovrei ascoltare uno dei tuoi cupi podcast.

translation.en: Bailey got to you, huh?
Mock our music, and I won't tell you my theory.
translation.it: Prendi in giro la nostra musica e non ti dirò la mia teoria.

translation.en: My lips are sealed.
She's new to the scene. Has to be. Otherwise, we would have heard about her.
translation.it: Dev'essere nuova nel giro. Altrimenti avremmo sentito parlare di lei.

translation.en: To get a guest list like that-- She's working with someone else. A veteran. But who?
translation.it: - Per avere una lista… - Lavora con qualcuno. Un veterano.

translation.en: We'll make a list. I'll bring snacks.
translation.it: Ma chi? Butteremo giù una lista. Porto qualche snack.

translation.en: I, uh, I'm sorry. I already have… a brunch date.
translation.it: Scusa, ma ho già… un appuntamento per il brunch.

translation.en: Can I come?
Bye, Parker.
[Stone] Ivo? It's been a while.
Nine of Hearts, it's good to see you.
translation.it: Nove di Cuori, è bello vederti.

translation.en: -How's it going? -It's been busy. This way.
translation.it: - Come va? - Periodo intenso. Per di qua.

translation.en: The Charter has been dealing with three actionable threats this morning.
translation.it: Il Charter si è occupato di tre minacce attive stamattina.

translation.en: Potential sarin gas attack in Paris.
translation.it: Potenziale attacco di gas Sarin a Parigi.

translation.en: The Heart predicted the time and location of the attack with 87% certainty.
translation.it: Il Cuore ha previsto l'ora e il luogo con l'87% di accuratezza.

translation.en: Eight of Hearts is on site now.
translation.it: Otto di Cuori è sul posto.

translation.en: Six is defusing a potential international incident
translation.it: Sei sta disinnescando un potenziale incidente internazionale

translation.en: in the South China Sea.
And Diamonds team's handling hackers targeting the North American power grid.
translation.it: e il team di Quadri un attacco hacker alla rete elettrica nordamericana.

translation.en: That, um… That's the peacock.
-Hi. -Came with the house.
-[peafowl caws] -[Stone] Hey, Jack. Enjoying your new office?
translation.it: Ehi, Jack. Ti godi il nuovo ufficio?

translation.en: We can't all be gallivanting around the Alps.
translation.it: Non tutti possono andarsene a zonzo per le Alpi.

translation.en: How's King of Hearts? Is she angry?
translation.it: Come sta il Re di Cuori? È arrabbiata?

translation.en: Have you seen her yet?
Well, let's see. You lost control of the situation, target is dead,
translation.it: Dunque, hai perso il controllo della situazione, il target è morto e hai dovuto uccidere sei uomini.

translation.en: then you had to kill six men.
translation.it: il target è morto e hai dovuto uccidere sei uomini.

translation.en: What a glorious outcome.
translation.it: Che risultato grandioso. Medaglie al valore per tutti.

translation.en: -Victoria Crosses all around. -[Stone] Morning, Nomad.
translation.it: Che risultato grandioso. Medaglie al valore per tutti. 'Giorno, Nomade.

translation.en: Good to see you too. Love what you've done with the place.
translation.it: Anche per me è un piacere vederti. Hai sistemato bene.

translation.en: Is she developing a sense of humor?
-Did you find the girl? -Of course.
She is from Pune in the west of India.
Orphaned at eight.
[Stone] How'd she learn to program? Ever heard of Niam Kharche?
translation.it: - Come ha imparato a programmare? - Conosci Niam Kharche?

translation.en: Billionaire investor, pharmaceuticals. Had business in Pune.
translation.it: - Miliardario, settore farmaceutico. - Aveva affari a Pune.

translation.en: Ran IT workshops for kids in underprivileged communities.
translation.it: Teneva seminari d'informatica per bambini svantaggiati.

translation.en: [Stone] He spotted her in one of these programs.
translation.it: L'ha notata in uno di questi programmi.

translation.en: Yeah. He saw she was a prodigy, took her under his wing, trained her up,
translation.it: Sì. Ha visto che era un genio, l'ha presa con sé, l'ha addestrata e poi hanno litigato.

translation.en: and then they had a falling out.
translation.it: l'ha presa con sé, l'ha addestrata e poi hanno litigato.

in front of your face…
the whole time.

Cell phones, power grids, the banks, governments, military, health records.

translation.en: Your secrets.

I bet you used to think we were so alike. Now you know I'm better.

I'm coming for you.
-Morning, ma'am. -Morning.

translation.en: He has no one he cares for. There's nothing much to live for.

translation.en: Chechnya, December 2015.
What's this?
It was before your time. Before the Heart, for that matter.

translation.en: The West, as always, were looking the other way.

translation.en: He was wiping out whole villages, trying to stamp out dissent.

Different identity. No electronic records.

delivering weapons to take the warlord out.

translation.en: We thought there was no one left to save.
The region was a tinderbox on the verge of full civil war.
translation.it: La regione era una polveriera sull'orlo di una guerra civile.

translation.en: We couldn't let those weapons fall into the warlord's hands.
translation.it: Quelle armi non dovevano finire nelle mani del ceceno.

translation.en: It would have cost thousands of lives.
We had a drone that was stationed overhead armed with missiles.
translation.it: Avevamo un drone di stanza lì sopra, armato di missili.

translation.en: I gave the order myself.
We made it look like a rebel force had ordered the drone strike.
translation.it: Facemmo in modo che sembrasse un attacco dei ribelli.

translation.en: MI6 buried their mistake.
No report, no investigation.
No record of the personnel who had been involved.
translation.it: nessuna traccia del personale che era stato coinvolto.

translation.en: We thought everyone had died.
Until a few hours ago.
What a mess.
So, you think… he knows it was us?
translation.it: Quindi, credi che sappia che siamo stati noi?

translation.en: I think that's a safe assumption.
And now he wants to destroy the Charter.
translation.it: E ora vuole distruggere il Charter.

translation.en: You killed Bailey and Yang?
That wasn't the plan.
You stick to the tech and leave strategy to me, okay?
translation.it: Pensa alla tecnologia e lascia la strategia a me, ok?

translation.en: Let me remind you, we're partners. Okay? So if you want me to do my job,
translation.it: Ti ricordo che siamo soci. Se vuoi che faccia il mio lavoro,

translation.en: you have to tell me what you're doing before you do it.
translation.it: devi dirmi cosa stai facendo prima di farlo.

translation.en: Let me remind you, the Charter don't give two shits about people like Bailey and Yang.
translation.it: Ti ricordo che il Charter se ne sbatte di gente come Bailey e Yang.

translation.en: So, if you want us to succeed, you shouldn't either.
translation.it: Se ci tieni alla riuscita del piano, dovresti fare lo stesso.

translation.en: [Stone] Hey, Barry.
I'm a friend of your dad's.
It's okay.
[whispers] I've got you.
The camera.
She hacked into the camera feed.
Let's see how well she covered her tracks.
translation.it: Vediamo se ha coperto bene le sue tracce.

translation.en: There she is.
What's in the desert, Keya?
I'm guessing it's not the nightlife.
Are you shitting me?
West Africa. The Locker.
[Parker] You ever done this before? Choppered in at over 40,000 feet?
translation.it: L'hai mai fatto? Volare in elicottero a più di 12.000 m?

translation.en: Trick question. No one has.
translation.it: Domanda a trabocchetto. Nessuno l'ha fatto.

translation.en: But my mama always said I could do anything.
translation.it: Ma mia madre diceva che potevo fare qualsiasi cosa.

translation.en: How long do we have before the Locker descends?
translation.it: Quanto abbiamo prima che il Locker scenda?

translation.en: Eleven hours and seven minutes.
At which point, the Charter will realize what's going on.
translation.it: A quel punto, capiranno cosa sta succedendo.

translation.en: It'll take nine minutes and 26 seconds for the Locker to drop to 40,000 feet.
translation.it: Il Locker impiegherà nove minuti e 26 secondi a scendere a 12.000 m.

translation.en: We'll have about eight minutes to get in, take the Heart,
translation.it: Avremo otto minuti per entrare, prendere il Cuore e uscire.

translation.en: and get out again before they regain control.
translation.it: Avremo otto minuti per entrare, prendere il Cuore e uscire. - Poi riprenderanno il controllo. - Molto preciso. Sei sicura?

translation.en: Very precise. You're sure?
translation.it: - Poi riprenderanno il controllo. - Molto preciso. Sei sicura?

translation.en: No. I'll be sure when it descends.
If they found my code, it won't descend, they'll be waiting for us, and we all die.
translation.it: Se trovano il mio codice, non scenderà, ci prenderanno e moriremo.

translation.en: -Hey. -Good morning.
What time is it?
Uh, it's nearly seven. What? Oh shit.
[Ivo] Any luck?
Uh… nothing. But they need to pop their heads up at some point.
translation.it: - Hai avuto fortuna? - Niente. Ma dovranno pur riemergere, prima o poi.

translation.en: -I'll see if they-- -[alarm blaring]
Oh no, no, no, no, no.
Get Nomad now! Get Nomad now!
Just get me up there. I'll do the rest.
translation.it: Portami lassù. Io farò il resto.

translation.en: Nomad will string me up for this. Tell her I stole your keys.
translation.it: - Nomade m'impiccherà. - Dille che ti ho rubato le chiavi.

translation.en: You'll just have to trust me.
[Keya] Okay. Moment of truth.
translation.it: Ok. È il momento della verità.

translation.en: How will we know if it's worked?
Would you look at that?
The Locker has been dropped 15,000 feet in the last two minutes.
translation.it: Il Locker è sceso di 4.500 m negli ultimi due minuti.

translation.en: Still descending.
Security systems are all down. I'm locked out.
translation.it: I sistemi di sicurezza sono andati. Sono chiuso fuori.

translation.en: -How is that even possible? Another hack? -No. No.
translation.it: Com'è possibile? Un altro hackeraggio? No. Perciò hanno piantato un virus la prima volta.

translation.en: This is why they did it the first time.
translation.it: No. Perciò hanno piantato un virus la prima volta.

translation.en: It's been lying dormant in our system until now.
translation.it: È rimasto inattivo nel sistema finora.

translation.en: -Can you override it? -I'm trying.
[Ivo] The air lock's been breached. Contact every Charter agent in the region.
translation.it: - La camera stagna è stata forzata. - Contatta ogni agente in zona.

translation.en: There's no one within 500 miles.
translation.it: Non c'è nessuno nel raggio di 800 km.

translation.en: [pilot] Approaching coordinates in five, four, three--
translation.it: Avvicinamento alle coordinate tra cinque, quattro, tre…

translation.en: -I hope you know what you're doing. -[Stone] Tell me about it.
translation.it: - Spero tu sappia quello che fai. - Figurati io.

translation.en: -We have a something approaching fast. -[Nomad] A something?
-[Jack] Thirty seconds out. -What is it?
I think-- I think it's a someone.
Who is it?
Go in closer.
Is that--?
It's Stone.
I have to descend. Lower the rotor speed.
translation.it: Devo scendere. Abbassare la velocità del rotore.

translation.en: [Parker] Copy that. See you in seven minutes.
translation.it: Ricevuto. Ci vediamo tra sette minuti.

translation.en: [Nomad] She's not gonna make it.
Look who it is.
-I'm gonna need a minute. -No!
The ship's lining is filled with hydrogen. One spark, and we're all dead.
translation.it: È pieno d'idrogeno. Una scintilla e moriamo tutti.

translation.en: No way to get hold of her.
Come on, Rachel.
Come on.
It's over, Keya.
For who?
I told you not to get out of the van.
translation.it: Ti avevo detto di restare nel furgone.

translation.en: You also told me to have some fun.
translation.it: Mi hai anche detto di divertirmi.

translation.en: It's gone.
And now you answer to me.
We've lost the Heart.
Not yet.
Parker. Ninety seconds. Let's go.
[Parker] Shame about your parachute. You'll be needing that.
translation.it: Peccato per il paracadute. Ti servirà.

translation.en: -[Stone grunts] -[Keya] Get off me!
No, no, no, no, no! [screams]
-Get after them. -Impossible.
-We'll be lucky to get to base as it is. -[grunts]
Get away!
Leave me alone!
Morning, sunshine.
Give me that thing before somebody gets--
I don't think so.
So, here's what's gonna happen.
You're gonna secret-agent our way back to civilization,
translation.it: Tu farai il tuo e ci riporterai alla civiltà,

translation.en: and I'm gonna follow three steps behind you with this gun.
translation.it: e io starò tre passi dietro di te con questa.

translation.en: -Where's the Heart? -Parker has it.
translation.it: - Dov'è il Cuore? - Ce l'ha Parker.

translation.en: But I encrypted it to my biometrics, so it's useless without me.
translation.it: Ma l'ho criptato con i miei dati biometrici.

translation.en: Come on, get up.
If I shoot you now, all this is over.
translation.it: Se ora ti sparo, finisce tutto qui.

translation.en: Show you the same mercy you showed Bailey and Yang.
translation.it: Ti mostrerò la stessa pietà che avete mostrato a Bailey e Yang.

translation.en: It's the logical play, Rachel.
translation.it: È la cosa più logica, Rachel.

translation.en: It's what the Heart would tell you to do.
translation.it: Ciò che il Cuore ti direbbe di fare.

translation.en: I'm not like you.
On your feet.
We need to keep moving.
So, what's the plan, Keya?
translation.it: Allora, qual è il piano, Keya?

translation.en: Trying to get even with Niam Kharche for kicking you out of the penthouse?
translation.it: Pareggiare i conti con Niam Kharche per averti cacciato?

translation.en: Right. You think you know everything.
I bet the Heart told you that he adopted me,
translation.it: Il Cuore ti avrà detto che mi ha adottata, salvata dal nulla,

translation.en: lifted me out of nothing. But did it tell you why?
translation.it: Il Cuore ti avrà detto che mi ha adottata, salvata dal nulla, ma ti ha detto perché?

translation.en: Kharche used my parents like lab rats in a medical trial, and it killed them.
translation.it: Ha usato i miei genitori come cavie per un esperimento e li ha uccisi.

translation.en: He covered everything up and took me in thinking he was doing me a favor,
translation.it: Ha insabbiato tutto e mi ha presa con sé. Gli ho fatto credere di essere grata

translation.en: but I let him think that because I knew one day,
translation.it: Ha insabbiato tutto e mi ha presa con sé. Gli ho fatto credere di essere grata perché sapevo che un giorno sarei stata in grado di fargliela pagare.

translation.en: I'd be strong enough to make him pay for what he did to my parents.
translation.it: perché sapevo che un giorno sarei stata in grado di fargliela pagare.

translation.en: So, you get to tear the whole world down? Oh, this is not just for me.
translation.it: - Distruggendo il mondo? - Non è solo per me.

translation.en: It's for people like me.
Parker's gonna destroy the Charter.
I've got my whole naughty list, and we're going to expose them all.
translation.it: e io ho una lista dei cattivi e li esporremo.

translation.en: With no thought of what comes next.
translation.it: Senza pensare a cosa accadrà dopo.

translation.en: You're a child. And you think the Charter's any better?
translation.it: - Sei una bambina. - Pensi che il Charter sia migliore?

translation.en: Just because they saved you doesn't make them good.
translation.it: L'averti salvato non li rende buoni.

translation.en: You think I didn't look into you?
How many schools did you get kicked out of?
Seven? Eight?
Always a rebel. Always a problem.
Violent, alone, helpless.
-Stop. -Until the Charter comes along, right? And gives you that discipline that you so clearly crave.
translation.it: Finché non arriva il Charter e ti dà la disciplina che tanto aneli.

translation.en: But did they take you in because you were good?
translation.it: Ma ti hanno presa perché eri brava?

translation.en: -Or because you were broken? -Enough.
Maybe I was broken.
But there's a woman I know only as Nomad.
translation.it: Ma c'è una donna che conosco come Nomade.

translation.en: She rescued me, trained me,
showed me what's possible when there's someone watching your back.
translation.it: mostrato cosa puoi fare quando qualcuno ti guarda le spalle.

translation.en: Where is she now?
Let's go.
Parker's coming for you, and I wanna have a bigger gun when he shows up.
translation.it: Quando arriverà Parker vorrei accoglierlo con una pistola più grande.

translation.en: They're headed for us.
Maybe it's Parker.
It's definitely not the Charter.
[Stone] Mercenaries?
Okay, let's just, um, give them a good cover story.
translation.it: Ok, inventiamoci una storia che regga.

translation.en: They'll keep us alive for ransom. We reel them in, and then bam.
translation.it: Ci terranno in vita in cambio di un riscatto. E poi, bam.

translation.en: Just to be clear, the "bam" is for you to take them out.
translation.it: Il "bam" sei tu che li fai fuori.

translation.en: Yeah, I get that.
[woman in French] Who are you? And what the hell are you doing out here?
translation.it: Chi siete? E che diavolo ci fate qui?

translation.en: Need a ride?
You're an angel.
[in English] You know, the Charter can take down Kharche.
Parker's way isn't the only way.
[in French] How can we repay you?
You already have.
[in English] Come with me.
She got away.
That wasn't the deal.
Killing her wasn't the deal either. You have to pay me now.
translation.it: Nemmeno ucciderla era nell'accordo. Devi pagarmi subito.

translation.en: The deal changed.
You're a hard woman to find.
Six of Hearts.
Nomad sends her best.
Dhawan is back with Parker. I slipped her a tracker.
translation.it: Dhawan è con Parker. Le ho messo un localizzatore.

translation.en: They're heading north. Looping you in now.
translation.it: Sono diretti verso nord. Ti sto collegando.

translation.en: [Nomad] Hi, Rachel.
Nice to hear your voice. I was a bit worried about you.
translation.it: È bello sentirti. Ero un po' preoccupata per te.

translation.en: Were you?
Okay, got her. They're heading towards Iceland.
translation.it: Ok, ce l'ho. Si dirigono verso l'Islanda.

translation.en: I take it I'm no longer compromised.
Well, they have the Heart, so we're all compromised.
translation.it: Hanno il Cuore, adesso lo siamo tutti.

translation.en: Parker's coming after the Charter, so we're heading to a secure location.
translation.it: Parker dà la caccia al Charter, andiamo in un luogo sicuro.

translation.en: Clubs is assembling a team. We'll make sure they're on the ground by the time you arrive.
translation.it: I Fiori stanno radunando un team. Saranno lì al vostro arrivo.

translation.en: And if we're too late?
Just get there as fast as you can.
If they get the Heart online, God knows what they're capable of.
translation.it: Se mettono il Cuore online, Dio solo sa cosa potranno fare.

translation.en: I'm on my way.
It's not impregnable, but it's the best we've got.
translation.it: Non è inespugnabile, ma è il meglio che abbiamo.

translation.en: If the Heart wants to find us, it will.
translation.it: Se il Cuore vuole trovarci, lo farà.

translation.en: [Stone] Will this hunk of junk make it to Iceland?
Hell yeah.
Nice trick you pulled with the facial recognition yesterday.
translation.it: Bel trucco ieri, con il riconoscimento facciale.

translation.en: Trying to put a lock on our new toy.
Would you come back for me if I hadn't?
We're a team, Keya.
Don't do it again.
I think I have it.
I know where they're going. Reykjavik University computer lab.
translation.it: Al laboratorio informatico dell'Università di Reykjavik.

translation.en: It has a cryo-storage facility, several floors of servers.
translation.it: Una struttura di crioconservazione, diversi piani di server.

translation.en: The tracker's heading straight for it.
See, Keya, don't say I don't keep my promises.
translation.it: Visto? Poi non dire che non mantengo le promesse.

translation.en: Okay, be ready. You know your instructions.
translation.it: Ok, tenetevi pronti. Sapete tutti cosa dovete fare.

translation.en: Couple of minutes, we'll be up and running.
translation.it: Un paio di minuti e saremo operativi.

translation.en: Are we up?
We're up.
Is this your naughty list?
translation.it: - La tua lista dei cattivi? - E-mail, messaggi, conti bancari.

translation.en: Emails, texts, bank accounts. The Heart's using my algorithm to sort through it all.
translation.it: - La tua lista dei cattivi? - E-mail, messaggi, conti bancari. - Il Cuore sta analizzando tutto. - Possiamo scovare chiunque?

translation.en: So, we can find anyone? Gain access to anything?
translation.it: - Il Cuore sta analizzando tutto. - Possiamo scovare chiunque? - Accedere a qualsiasi cosa? - Il passe-partout più grande del mondo.

translation.en: Greatest skeleton key in the world.
translation.it: - Accedere a qualsiasi cosa? - Il passe-partout più grande del mondo.

translation.en: Show me.
[Keya] There it is.
Evidence of Kharche's years of experiments on innocents across the country.
translation.it: Prove degli esperimenti di Kharche su persone innocenti.

translation.en: That's the truth… for the world to see.
translation.it: Ecco la verità. E tutti la sapranno.

translation.en: That's impressive. But let's see what else this thing can do.
translation.it: Impressionante. Ma vediamo cos'altro può fare.

translation.en: Find me the Kings.
What are you doing?
[woman] Nancy Morrison. King of Diamonds. Ex-CIA.
translation.it: Nancy Morrison. Re di Quadri. Ex CIA.

translation.en: The Heart tells us she's heading to a safe house with her family.
translation.it: Sta andando in un alloggio sicuro con la sua famiglia.

translation.en: Drop the lift.
Are you serious?
No. Do--
You're welcome.
[man] Hang on. I have another one.
I think you're gonna like this, boss.
An unidentified military plane landed at a private airfield 33 minutes ago.
translation.it: Un aereo militare non identificato è atterrato 33 minuti fa.

translation.en: There.
Jiang Hsu. Served 35 years in Chinese State Security Service.
translation.it: Jiang Hsu. Trentacinque anni nella Sicurezza nazionale cinese.

translation.en: The King of Clubs is here in Iceland.
translation.it: Il Re di Fiori è qui in Islanda.

translation.en: Even better. Where is he now?
Two minutes out.
translation.it: - Due minuti. - Vi mando le mappe.

translation.en: Sending the plans now. Stone is on her way.
translation.it: - Due minuti. - Vi mando le mappe. Stone sta arrivando.

translation.en: We don't have time to wait. Tell her to follow us in.
translation.it: Non possiamo aspettare. Dille di seguirci dentro.

translation.en: Any news of Spades or Hearts?
[man] Nothing yet.
There were other people in that elevator. In that lobby.
translation.it: C'erano altre persone in quell'ascensore. In quell'atrio.

translation.en: Calm down, Keya.
You said we were going to expose Kharche and then the Charter, not murder them.
translation.it: Avevi parlato di smascherare Kharche e il Charter, non di ucciderli.

translation.en: The King of Hearts with her team. They're in a bunker outside of London.
translation.it: Il Re di Cuori e il suo team. Sono in un bunker fuori Londra.

translation.en: Good.
Take them out.
[Clubs] We're approaching now.
-We'll see you on the other side. -You're going in with them?
translation.it: - Ci vediamo dall'altra parte. - Vai dentro?

translation.en: I ordered the strike on Parker. It's only fair.
translation.it: Ho ordinato io l'attacco a Parker. È giusto così.

translation.en: You know… I would have made the same call in Chechnya.
translation.it: Sai una cosa? - Avrei fatto lo stesso in Cecenia. - Grazie. La cosa…

translation.en: Thanks. The right--
translation.it: - Avrei fatto lo stesso in Cecenia. - Grazie. La cosa…

translation.en: I've lost contact.
The Heart's online.
No, no, no, no.
We're locked in.
[Jack] Oh God. They've shut off our ventilation system.
translation.it: Oddio. Hanno spento il sistema di ventilazione.

translation.en: No, no, no, no.
Jack, how long we got?
At this rate, about an hour and we're out of oxygen.
translation.it: Di questo passo, circa un'ora e finiremo l'ossigeno.

translation.en: The Charter never worries about who gets in their way. Neither will we.
translation.it: Il Charter non bada a chi li intralcia, e nemmeno noi.

translation.en: [woman] King of Hearts is locked in. They'll be dead in an hour.
translation.it: Cuori è bloccato. Un'ora e moriranno.

translation.en: -You have to stop this, please. -Someone has to control this power, Keya.
translation.it: - Fermali, ti prego. - Qualcuno deve controllare questo potere.

translation.en: -Why not us? -This is not what we agreed.
translation.it: - Perché non noi? - L'accordo era un altro!

translation.en: You're still not seeing the bigger picture.
This isn't about some pissy little grievance you had with the bad man who killed your mom and dad.
translation.it: Non si tratta del rancore che provi per chi ha ucciso i tuoi.

translation.en: This is about power.
Concentrated in the hands of the few, of the very few who could use it for good,
translation.it: Concentrato nelle mani dei pochissimi che potrebbero usarlo per il bene,

translation.en: who could actually make a change, but they don't.
translation.it: per cambiare le cose, ma non lo fanno.

translation.en: At this moment, we are mining trillions of pieces of data.
translation.it: In questo momento, stiamo estraendo trilioni di dati.

translation.en: In a matter of hours, I will be able to take down
translation.it: Nel giro di poche ore, potrò eliminare i restanti membri del Charter.

translation.en: the remaining members of the Charter.
translation.it: potrò eliminare i restanti membri del Charter.

translation.en: We've been used and manipulated our whole lives.
translation.it: Ci hanno usati e manipolati per tutta la vita.

translation.en: Now it's time for us to take control.
[Clubs] Go.
[man] Clubs team are inside the university building.
What… are you doing?
You wanna know how great men get power, Keya?
translation.it: Sai come ottengono il potere i grandi uomini?

translation.en: It's not because they earn it…
or because they deserve it.
It is because when the moment comes,
translation.it: ma perché, quando arriva il momento,

translation.en: they take it.
Stone is one minute out.
translation.it: Stone è a un minuto da lì.

translation.en: In position. We're all set.
[woman] She's approaching the university.
Stone, you need to get out now.
I don't have long. Keya?
I have a failsafe uploading. It will disable the Heart.
translation.it: Sto caricando un failsafe. Disabiliterà il Cuore.

translation.en: They won't be able to access it without me.
I'm outside. But you already know that.
translation.it: Sono qui fuori, ma questo lo sai già.

translation.en: No, you're not. It's a trap.
translation.it: No, non sei qui! È una trappola.

translation.en: I found your tracker.
translation.it: Ho trovato il localizzatore. Il laboratorio è un'esca.

translation.en: The lab is a decoy. You need to get your team out now.
translation.it: Ho trovato il localizzatore. Il laboratorio è un'esca. Devi far uscire il tuo team.

translation.en: -Why should I believe you? -Because you were right.
translation.it: - Perché dovrei crederti? - Perché avevi ragione, ok? Su Parker.

translation.en: Okay? You told me about Parker, and you were right about everything.
translation.it: - Perché dovrei crederti? - Perché avevi ragione, ok? Su Parker. Avevi ragione su tutto.

translation.en: My parents would have never wanted this.
translation.it: I miei non avrebbero voluto questo.

translation.en: Just please listen to me.
Get your team out of there right now.
translation.it: Fa' uscire da lì il tuo team.

translation.en: -Tell me where you are. -[Keya] Okay.
I'm sending you my coordinates. I'll leave the back door open.
translation.it: Ti mando le coordinate. Lascio aperta la porta sul retro.

translation.en: Shit.
[grunts] I'm Nine of Hearts. I need your radio.
translation.it: Sono Nove di Cuori, dammi la radio!

translation.en: [groans] Go.
This is Nine of Hearts. Get out of there. It's a trap.
translation.it: Qui è Nove di Cuori. Uscite da lì. È una trappola.

translation.en: Do you hear me? She found the tracker. Get out of there.
translation.it: Mi sentite? Ha trovato il localizzatore. Uscite da lì.

translation.en: Do you hear me?
Yeah… I hear you.
What's going on?
-Where is she? -[woman hesitates]
-[woman mumbles] -What has she done? -How long to fix it? -Oh.
translation.it: Che cos'ha fatto? Quanto ci vuole per risolvere?

translation.en: I-- Could be minutes. Could be hours.
You have until I get back.
[Jack] The door won't move.
[grunts] Damn it! [Ivo] There must be an emergency override system.
translation.it: - Maledizione! - Dev'esserci un sistema di emergenza.

translation.en: We must have missed something.
Jack, is there any way we can get hold of Stone?
translation.it: Jack, c'è modo di contattare Stone?

translation.en: No. No comms. We're still offline.
Maybe-- Maybe try the landline.
translation.it: Magari… prova con il telefono fisso.

translation.en: [groans] Okay. Okay.
-[Nomad] Stone, thank God. Where are you? -Clubs are dead.
translation.it: - Stone, grazie a Dio. Dove sei? - I Fiori sono morti.

translation.en: University was a trap.
I have new intel.
A new location.
We've-- We've lost Clubs?
What new intel?
[Stone] Keya. She shut down the Heart.
translation.it: - Che informazioni? - Keya. Ha disattivato il Cuore.

translation.en: -How do you know she's not playing you? -I don't.
[Nomad] We're gonna die in less than an hour.
-They shut down our air supply. -What?
-She shut down our air supply. -[Stone] Parker did.
translation.it: - È stata lei. - È stato Parker.

translation.en: I believe her, Nomad.
I'd be dead too if I hadn't listened to her. I trust her, and you need to trust me.
translation.it: Sarei morta se non l'avessi ascoltata. Io mi fido di lei e tu devi fidarti di me.

translation.en: Fifty minutes.
I can work with that.
I'll see you.
You too.
Sorry, I need your truck.
[Parker] I know you're in here, Keya.
You know, you still have a choice.
You can still be a part of this.
You're only delaying the inevitable.
-Would you like me to wait? -[Stone] Definitely no.
But thanks!
Come on, Keya.
[Nomad] Settle down now.
Conserve air.
-Move. -[panting]
Get the Heart back online.
Do it!
Get up.
Get up!
[Parker] Right. Where do we start?
Fingers?
No, we'll be needing those. Knees?
-[Keya screams] -Yeah.
Last chance.
[inhales] Okay, I'll do it.
Go on.
I need to get back in there.
The Heart has to be disconnected and reconnected again to the servers.
translation.it: Dev'essere fisicamente disconnesso e ricollegato ai server.

translation.en: Any interference, the system automatically shuts down. You know that.
translation.it: Basta un'interferenza e il sistema si spegne in automatico.

translation.en: [Parker] Move.
This doesn't end well for you, Stone. Take another step, and she's dead.
translation.it: Non finirà bene per te. Fai un altro passo e lei muore.

translation.en: -I don't care. I'm here for you. -[Parker] Bullshit.
translation.it: Non m'importa. Sono qui per te. Cazzate.

translation.en: You and I know that without this one,
translation.it: Lo sappiamo che, senza di lei,

translation.en: the Heart stays down and everyone inside that bunker dies,
translation.it: il Cuore resterà offline e nel bunker moriranno.

translation.en: unless, of course, they're dead already.
translation.it: Sempre che non siano già morti.

translation.en: I have the Heart, and I have the Kings. That's a winning hand.
translation.it: Ho il Cuore e ho i Re. È una mano vincente.

translation.en: Okay. I'll put it down.
Good girl. Now, kick it away.
Tell me this, though.
What's your point, hm?
And why do you have to kill them to make it?
translation.it: E perché devi ucciderli per farcela?

translation.en: I've served my entire life, Rachel, and none of it mattered.
translation.it: Ho prestato servizio tutta la vita e non è servito a niente.

translation.en: The world is still in chaos.
translation.it: Il mondo è ancora nel caos.

translation.en: The Heart has the power to change everything.
But the Charter are using it to keep things exactly as they are.
translation.it: Ma il Charter lo usa per mantenere tutto esattamente com'è.

translation.en: You don't wanna change anything. You just wanna be the one in charge.
translation.it: Tu non vuoi cambiare niente. Vuoi solo essere al comando.

translation.en: First thing you did with all that power was kill people.
translation.it: La prima cosa che hai fatto con quel potere è stato uccidere.

translation.en: [scoffs] The problem with men like you, Parker,
translation.it: È il problema di quelli come te.

translation.en: is that your power is only ever based on threats and violence.
translation.it: Il vostro potere si basa solo su minacce e violenza.

translation.en: And when you brutalize everyone around you, even your own team…
translation.it: E se brutalizzi chiunque ti circondi, perfino la tua squadra,

translation.en: you'll never have the one thing I know I always will.
translation.it: non avrai mai l'unica cosa che io avrò sempre.

translation.en: Yeah?
And what is that, Rachel?
Someone to watch my back.
Maybe in the next life. [chuckles]
See you when I get there. [exhales]
[Stone] Nomad, tell me you're okay.
Is everyone still with us?
[groans] Yeah, yeah.
It's good to hear from you, Stone.
I knew I would.
Hey, Barry.
What's this? I don't know.
It's beautiful.
[girl] But what is it? Who's it from?
[Stone] Looking good.
I decided to embrace the cliché and use my time in jail to get ripped.
translation.it: Ho abbracciato il cliché del carcerato che mette su i muscoli.

translation.en: You've had worse goals.
So my lawyers tell me.
And you? Back with the Charter?
[inhales] Yeah, I'm back with the Charter.
translation.it: Sì, sono di nuovo col Charter.

translation.en: But on two conditions.
The Heart's an amazing tool.
translation.it: Il Cuore è uno strumento fantastico.

translation.en: But that's all it is.
If we only follow the odds, we'll never do anything in spite of the odds.
translation.it: Seguendo solo le probabilità, non faremo niente contro di esse.

translation.en: And what if the odds tell you to do nothing?
translation.it: E se le probabilità dicessero di non fare nulla?

translation.en: That's when they send me.
What's the second thing?
I liked my team, Keya.
translation.it: Mi piaceva il mio team, Keya.

translation.en: I miss them.
I wanna surround myself with people who will change the world for good.
translation.it: Voglio circondarmi di persone che cambieranno davvero il mondo.

translation.en: How we doing, Jack?
[Jack] Good news and bad news.
The good news, I've scouted the square, and your plan just might work.
translation.it: La buona: ho perlustrato la piazza e potrebbe funzionare.

translation.en: The bad news--
[exhales] Uh, they were out of oat milk.
-[car door closes] -Jack.
What? You told me to blend in.
Did we get into the power grid?
Yeah. It wasn't that hard, because their password was "password."
translation.it: Sì. Non è stato difficile. La loro password era "password".

translation.en: Your coffee.
Thank you.
This is cold.
Um, you know we can still throw you in jail, right?
[Stone] Hey.
Stay in the van.
We stay in the van, boss.
-The Heart's all set. -[Stone] And the diversion?
translation.it: Il Cuore è pronto. - E il diversivo? - Pure.

translation.en: Ready.
[exhales] Go give them the bam.
Always.
